channel.title: How to run servers?total newby
channel.description: alrighty, so..i am completely new to moparscaping...but i would like to know how to run downloaded servers. so idownloaded a server, and i have no idea how to play it..anybody help?thanks a bunch

item.title: How to run servers?total newby
item.dc:creator: @DarkProject DarkProject
item.description:
@DarkProject wrote:

In other words, click the little gear in a box icon that is labeled ‘runserver’ and make sure in the black window that pops up it says ‘servername started successfully on 127.0.0.1:43594’ And if it does, head on over to the Mopar client, click the gear in the box in THERE that says ‘runMoparScape’ and once that is up and loaded, be sure to put in a user, pass, and for IP, if it isn’t already there, (it should be) it’s 127.0.0.1 and the port is ALREADY 43594.

Read full topic

item.title: How to run servers?total newby
item.dc:creator: @L_s_R L s R
item.description:
@L_s_R wrote:

Click the ‘runserver’ file the picture is liek a gear turning…

then just get on moparscape and log in using default port and ip
